016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.client;
017
018import com.codahale.metrics.Histogram;
019import com.codahale.metrics.Meter;
020import com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.api.DnsLookup;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.io.ByteBufferBackedInputStream;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientBadPayloadStreamException;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerShutdownStreamException;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerStreamException;
028import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ServerTimeoutStreamException;
029import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.spi.MessageReader;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.Marker;
032import org.apache.logging.log4j.MarkerManager;
033import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferAccumulator;
034import org.eclipse.jetty.io.ByteBufferPool;
035import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.*;
036import org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.client.WebSocketClient;
037import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
038import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
039
040import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
041import java.io.IOException;
042import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
043import java.net.URI;
044import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
045import java.nio.channels.ClosedChannelException;
046import java.nio.charset.Charset;
047import java.time.Duration;
048import java.util.Base64;
049import java.util.Iterator;
050import java.util.List;
051import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
052import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
053import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
054import java.util.function.Supplier;
055
056import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.lang.Exceptions.unwrap;
057
058public class SubscribeReactiveStream
059        implements WebSocketPartialListener,
060        WebSocketConnectionListener,
061        Subscription {
062
063    private final URI serverUri;
064    private final String streamName;
065
066    private ClientConfiguration subscriberConfiguration;
067    private long retryDelay;
068
069    private final DnsLookup dnsLookup;
070    private final WebSocketClient webSocketClient;
071    protected final Subscriber<Object> subscriber;
072    protected final MessageReader<Object> eventReader;
073    private final Supplier<Configuration> publisherConfiguration;
074    protected final ByteBufferPool byteBufferPool;
075    protected final Logger logger;
076    protected final CompletableFuture<Void> result;
077
078    protected final Marker marker;
079    protected final ByteBufferAccumulator byteBufferAccumulator;
080    private final AtomicLong requests = new AtomicLong();
081    private final AtomicLong outstandingRequests = new AtomicLong();
082    private long sendRequestsThreshold = 0;
083    private String exceptionPayload = "";
084
085    private Iterator<URI> uriIterator;
086    protected Session session;
087
088    protected final Meter received;
089    protected final Meter receivedBytes;
090    protected final Histogram requestsHistogram;
091
092    protected boolean isComplete; // true if onComplete or onError has been called
093    protected boolean isRetrying; // true if we're in the process of retrying/reconnecting
094    protected boolean isCancelled; // true if cancel() has been called or the result has been completed
095
096    public SubscribeReactiveStream(URI serverUri,
097                                   String streamName,
098                                   ClientConfiguration subscriberConfiguration,
099                                   DnsLookup dnsLookup,
100                                   WebSocketClient webSocketClient,
101                                   Subscriber<Object> subscriber,
102                                   MessageReader<Object> eventReader,
103                                   Supplier<Configuration> publisherConfiguration,
104                                   ByteBufferPool pool,
105                                   MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
106                                   Logger logger,
107                                   CompletableFuture<Void> result) {
108        this.serverUri = serverUri;
109        this.streamName = streamName;
110        this.subscriberConfiguration = subscriberConfiguration;
111        this.retryDelay = Duration.parse("PT" + subscriberConfiguration.getRetryDelay()).toMillis();
112        this.dnsLookup = dnsLookup;
113        this.webSocketClient = webSocketClient;
114        this.subscriber = subscriber;
115        this.eventReader = eventReader;
116        this.publisherConfiguration = publisherConfiguration;
117        this.byteBufferAccumulator = new ByteBufferAccumulator(pool, false);
118        this.byteBufferPool = pool;
119        this.logger = logger;
120
121        this.received = metricRegistry.meter("subscribe." + streamName + ".received");
122        this.receivedBytes = metricRegistry.meter("subscribe." + streamName + ".received.bytes");
123        this.requestsHistogram = metricRegistry.histogram("subscribe." + streamName + ".requests");
124
125        this.result = result;
126
127        this.marker = MarkerManager.getMarker(this.serverUri.getAuthority() + "/" + streamName);
128
129/*
130        this.result.whenComplete((r, t) ->
131        {
132            // Check if session is open
133            if (session != null) {
134                synchronized (session) {
135                    isComplete = true;
136                    if (session.isOpen()) {
137
138                        WriteCallbackCompletableFuture callback = new WriteCallbackCompletableFuture();
139                        session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "cancel", callback);
140                        callback.future().join();
141
142                        if (!isComplete) {
143                            isComplete = true;
144                            subscriber.onError(t);
145                        }
146                    }
147                }
148            }
149        });
150*/
151
152        subscriber.onSubscribe(this);
153
154        start();
155    }
156
157    // Connection process
158    public synchronized void start() {
159        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
160            logger.trace(marker, "start");
161        }
162
163        if (result.isDone()) {
164            return;
165        }
166
167        if (!webSocketClient.isStarted()) {
168            retry(null);
169        }
170
171        if (serverUri.getScheme().equals("srv")) {
172            logger.debug(marker, "Resolving " + serverUri);
173            dnsLookup.resolve(serverUri).thenApply(list ->
174            {
175                this.uriIterator = list.iterator();
176                return uriIterator;
177            }).thenAccept(this::connect).exceptionally(this::connectException);
178        } else {
179            this.uriIterator = List.of(serverUri).iterator();
180            connect(uriIterator);
181        }
182    }
183
184    private synchronized void connect(Iterator<URI> publisherURIs) {
185
186        if (publisherURIs.hasNext()) {
187            URI publisherWebsocketUri = publisherURIs.next();
188
189            if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
190                logger.trace(marker, "connect {}", publisherWebsocketUri);
191            }
192
193            URI effectivePublisherWebsocketUri = URI.create(publisherWebsocketUri.getScheme() + "://" + publisherWebsocketUri.getAuthority() + "/streams/publishers/" + streamName);
194            logger.debug(marker, "Trying " + effectivePublisherWebsocketUri);
195            try {
196                webSocketClient.connect(this, effectivePublisherWebsocketUri)
197                        .thenAccept(this::connected)
198                        .exceptionally(this::connectException);
199            } catch (Throwable e) {
200                logger.error(marker, "Could not subscribe to " + effectivePublisherWebsocketUri.toASCIIString(), e);
201                retry(e);
202            }
203        } else {
204            retry(null);
205        }
206    }
207
208    private void connected(Session session) {
209        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
210            logger.trace(marker, "connected");
211        }
212        this.session = session;
213        this.isRetrying = false;
214    }
215
216    private Void connectException(Throwable throwable) {
217        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
218            logger.trace(marker, "exceptionally", throwable);
219        }
220        retry(throwable);
221        return null;
222    }
223
224    public synchronized void retry(Throwable cause) {
225        if (subscriberConfiguration.isRetryEnabled()) {
226
227            if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
228                logger.trace(marker, "retry");
229            }
230
231            if (!isRetrying) {
232                logger.debug(marker, "Retrying", cause);
233                isRetrying = true;
234            }
235
236            requests.set(outstandingRequests.get());
237
238            if (uriIterator.hasNext()) {
239                connect(uriIterator);
240            } else {
241                if (cause instanceof ServerTimeoutStreamException) {
242                    start();
243                } else {
244                    CompletableFuture.delayedExecutor(retryDelay, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).execute(this::start);
245                    // Exponential backoff, gets reset on successful connect, max 60s delay
246                    retryDelay = Math.min(retryDelay * 2, 60000);
247                }
248            }
249        } else {
250            if (cause == null) {
251                if (!isComplete) {
252                    isComplete = true;
253                    subscriber.onComplete();
254                }
255                result.cancel(true);
256            } else {
257                if (!isComplete) {
258                    isComplete = true;
259                    subscriber.onError(cause);
260                }
261                result.completeExceptionally(cause);
262            }
263        }
264    }
265
266    // Subscription
267    @Override
268    public synchronized void request(long n) {
269        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
270            logger.trace(marker, "request {}", n);
271        }
272
273        requests.addAndGet(n);
274        outstandingRequests.addAndGet(n);
275
276        if (session != null) {
277            if (isCancelled || isComplete) {
278                return;
279            }
280            if (session.isOpen())
281                CompletableFuture.runAsync(this::sendRequests);
282        }
283    }
284
285    @Override
286    public synchronized void cancel() {
287        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
288            logger.trace(marker, "cancel");
289        }
290
291        if (session != null) {
292            synchronized (session) {
293                isCancelled = true;
294                requests.set(Long.MIN_VALUE);
295                if (session.isOpen())
296                    CompletableFuture.runAsync(this::sendRequests);
297            }
298        }
299    }
300
301    // Websocket
302    @Override
303    public synchronized void onWebSocketConnect(Session session) {
304        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
305            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketConnect {}", session.getRemoteAddress().toString());
306        }
307        this.session = session;
308        this.retryDelay = Duration.parse("PT" + subscriberConfiguration.getRetryDelay()).toMillis();
309
310        // First send parameters, if available
311        String parameterString = publisherConfiguration.get().json().toPrettyString();
312        session.getRemote().sendString(parameterString, new WriteCallbackCompletableFuture().with(f ->
313                f.future().thenAcceptAsync(Void ->
314                {
315                    logger.debug(marker, "Connected to {}", session.getUpgradeRequest().getRequestURI());
316                    CompletableFuture.runAsync(this::sendRequests);
317                }).exceptionally(t ->
318                {
319                    session.close(StatusCode.SERVER_ERROR, t.getMessage());
320                    logger.error(marker, "Parameter handshake failed", t);
321                    return null;
322                })
323        ));
324    }
325
326    @Override
327    public synchronized void onWebSocketPartialText(String payload, boolean fin) {
328        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
329            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketPartialText {} {}", payload, fin);
330        }
331
332        exceptionPayload += payload;
333        if (fin) {
334            Throwable throwable;
335            try {
336                ByteArrayInputStream bin = new ByteArrayInputStream(Base64.getDecoder().decode(exceptionPayload));
337                ObjectInputStream oin = new ObjectInputStream(bin);
338                throwable = (Throwable) oin.readObject();
339            } catch (Throwable e) {
340                throwable = e;
341            }
342
343            if (!isComplete) {
344                isComplete = true;
345                subscriber.onError(throwable);
346            }
347
348            // Ack to publisher
349            WriteCallbackCompletableFuture callback = new WriteCallbackCompletableFuture();
350            session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "onError", callback);
351            Throwable finalThrowable = throwable;
352            callback.future().handle((v, t) -> result.completeExceptionally(finalThrowable));
353        }
354    }
355
356    @Override
357    public synchronized void onWebSocketPartialBinary(ByteBuffer payload, boolean fin) {
358        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
359            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketPartialBinary {} {}", Charset.defaultCharset().decode(payload.asReadOnlyBuffer()).toString(), fin);
360        }
361
362        byteBufferAccumulator.copyBuffer(payload);
363        if (fin) {
364            onWebSocketBinary(byteBufferAccumulator.takeByteBuffer());
365            byteBufferAccumulator.close();
366        }
367    }
368
369    protected void onWebSocketBinary(ByteBuffer byteBuffer) {
370        try {
371            ByteBufferBackedInputStream inputStream = new ByteBufferBackedInputStream(byteBuffer);
372            Object event = eventReader.readFrom(inputStream);
373            received.mark();
374            receivedBytes.mark(byteBuffer.position());
375            byteBufferAccumulator.getByteBufferPool().release(byteBuffer);
376            subscriber.onNext(event);
377            outstandingRequests.decrementAndGet();
378        } catch (IOException e) {
379            logger.error("Could not receive value", e);
380
381            if (!isComplete) {
382                isComplete = true;
383                subscriber.onError(e);
384            }
385
386            // These kinds of errors are not retryable, we're done
387            WriteCallbackCompletableFuture callback = new WriteCallbackCompletableFuture();
388            session.close(StatusCode.NORMAL, "onError", callback);
389            callback.future().handle((v, t) -> result.completeExceptionally(e));
390        }
391    }
392
393    @Override
394    public synchronized void onWebSocketError(Throwable cause) {
395        cause = unwrap(cause);
396
397        if (!(cause instanceof ClosedChannelException)) {
398            if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
399                logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketError", cause);
400            }
401        }
402    }
403
404    @Override
405    public synchronized void onWebSocketClose(int statusCode, String reason) {
406        if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
407            logger.trace(marker, "onWebSocketClose {} {}", statusCode, reason);
408        }
409
410        if (statusCode == StatusCode.NORMAL) {
411            try {
412                if (!isComplete) {
413                    isComplete = true;
414                    subscriber.onComplete();
415                }
416            } catch (Exception e) {
417                logger.warn(marker, "Could not close subscription", e);
418            }
419            logger.debug(marker, "Complete subscription:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
420            result.complete(null); // Now considered done
421        } else if (statusCode == StatusCode.BAD_PAYLOAD) {
422            try {
423                if (!result.isCompletedExceptionally() && !isComplete) {
424                    isComplete = true;
425                    subscriber.onError(new ClientBadPayloadStreamException(reason));
426                }
427            } catch (Exception e) {
428                logger.warn(marker, "Could not close subscription", e);
429            }
430            logger.warn(marker, "Bad payload:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
431            result.completeExceptionally(new ClientBadPayloadStreamException(reason)); // Now considered done
432        } else if (statusCode == StatusCode.SHUTDOWN) {
433            if (reason.equals("Connection Idle Timeout")) {
434                logger.debug(marker, "Server timeout:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
435                retry(new ServerTimeoutStreamException("Server closed due to timeout"));
436            } else {
437                logger.warn(marker, "Server is shutting down:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
438                retry(new ServerShutdownStreamException("Server is shutting down"));
439            }
440        } else {
441            logger.warn(marker, "Websocket failed, retrying:{} {}", statusCode, reason);
442            retry(new ServerStreamException("Websocket failed:" + reason));
443        }
444    }
445
446    // Send requests
447    public synchronized void sendRequests() {
448        try {
449            if (!session.isOpen()) {
450                logger.debug(marker, "Session closed, cannot send requests");
451                return;
452            }
453
454            final long rn = requests.get();
455            if (rn == 0) {
456                if (isCancelled) {
457                    logger.debug(marker, "Subscription cancelled");
458                }
459                return;
460            }
461            if (sendRequestsThreshold == 0) {
462                sendRequestsThreshold = rn * 3 / 4;
463            } else {
464                if (rn < sendRequestsThreshold)
465                    return; // Wait until we have more requests lined up
466            }
467
468            requests.set(0);
469
470            logger.trace(marker, "Sending request: {}", rn);
471            requestsHistogram.update(rn);
472            session.getRemote().sendString(Long.toString(rn), new WriteCallback() {
473                @Override
474                public void writeFailed(Throwable x) {
475                    logger.error(marker, "Could not send requests {}", rn, x);
476                }
477
478                @Override
479                public void writeSuccess() {
480                    logger.trace(marker, "Successfully sent request {}", rn);
481                }
482            });
483
484            try {
485                logger.trace(marker, "Flushing remote session...");
486                session.getRemote().flush();
487                logger.trace(marker, "Remote session flushed.");
488            } catch (IOException e) {
489                logger.error(marker, "While flushing remote session", e);
490            }
491        } catch (Throwable t) {
492            logger.error(marker, "Error sending requests", t);
493        }
494    }
495}
